application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Chelsea Embankment Foreshore, Chelsea Embankment, LONDON, SW3 4LW
description: This application is for the existing river wall parapet to be reinstated along the embankment on the eastern and western side of the cofferdam.The length of the river wall parapet to be reinstated is approximately 13m at the eastern side and 5.5m on the western side. The river wall was removed under a previous CHEEF 5 consent approved in 2018 (RBKC Ref: TTT/18/00709. The river wall removal and reinstatement is in line with the DCO Approved Plan for Chelsea DCO-PP-12X-CHEEF-140004 January 2013, the works to be undertaken by the Ferrovial Agroman/Laing O'Rourke Joint Venture (FLO) within the Thames Tideway Chelsea Embankment worksite. The application is submitted under Schedule 3 Requirement CHEEF 6 of the Thames Water Utilities Limited (Thames Tideway Tunnel) Order 2014 (as amended) (the Order), and in accordance with the procedure set out by Schedule 17 of the Order
